TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but you can't use it because it is fake

I wish USS Enterprise (Star Trek) was real

Granted, but it is infested with Xenos, so you may not want to go on board...

How does this sort of thing even happen?

I wish for a working NES

Granted, but it is in actuality a Famicom, and it has region lock so that it can only work in Japan.

I wish for a Dinner Blaster.

Granted, but you make a waffle so big that it crushes you

I wish that I could dance

Granted, but you only dance terrible dances.

I wish constellation program still existed.

Granted, but the Space Launch System program still exists too, depriving NASA of funds to operate either space program.

I wish that everyone knew the Bagel Song.

Granted, but the second they learned it, they forgot it.

I wish Touhou was more popular.

Granted, but now there are 40 year old men making the fanbase really awkward.

I wish chess was faster paced.

Granted, but it is now played like checkers.

I wish for nothing.

Granted. You get Space

I wish for all the money in the world! Muahahaha!!!!

Yes, but the money is suddenly useless because no one has any except for you. So it is worth the approximate value of monopoly money!

I wish we had nuclear fusion.
Granted, but it creates a fuel hungy star in the first power plant that goes supernova in seconds due to a lack of fuel.

Not granted.

I wish for a giant balloon.

Granted, but the balloon carries you up 50,000 feet in the air before popping, causing you to hit the ground at around 200 mph.

I wish to meet Jeb.

Granted, but you get rammed by one of his SRBs.

I wish for a wish that wishes for a wish that wishes for a wish that wishes for a wish that wishes for a wish that wishes for a wish that wishes for a wish that wishes for a wish that wishes for a wish that wishes for a wish that wishes for a wish that wishes for a wish that wishes for a wish that wishes for a wish that wishes for a wish that wishes for a wish that wishes for a wish that wishes for a wish that wishes for a wish that wishes for a wish that wishes for a wish that wishes for a wish that wishes for a wish that wishes for a wish.

Granted. I don't need to corrupt this, its already corrupt.

I wish that I wasn't so lazy.

Granted, but you stop caring about all of your tasks that you previously were lazy about, causing you to not do them in the first place.

I wish that my A/C was more effective at cooling my house down in the 110+ Ã‚Â°F temperatures outside

Granted. Not gonna corrupt it cause I have the same problem (it's 110+ where I live, too).

I wish .21 would pass quality assurance and come out tomorrow, bug free.

Granted. All KSP Sites and forums go down for 21.43 thousand years

I wish for the earths rotation to slow down by 0.000000001%

Granted. A day is now 30 hours longer than before, screwing up your circadian rythm.

I wish for this wish to be corrupted to the maximum level by anyone who happened to corrupt this (get lengthy and creative!).

Granted. I don't need to explain why

I wish to kill Kim Jong-Un

Granted, but he is replaced with another dictator who is just as bad as him. (No really, that's what would probably happen if and when Kim Jong-Un is removed from power. )

I wish for some Kerbal Koffee.

Edited July 9, 2013 by (An Original Name)

Granted, but they forgot the creamer and sugar.

I wish I was a Djinn.

Granted, but you look like a stereotypical one.

I wish for some Duck Tape.

Granted. It's made out of duck skin.

I wish for struts.
